metadata.title: CVE-2023-50781 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: [Bleichenbacher timing attacks in the RSA decryption API - incomplete fixfor CVE-2020-25657]

criterions.comment: m2crypto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
